Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to examine activities Initiate Request appears once per case Not repeated Verify Documents appears multiple times in each case C001 two times first at 09:20 and second at 10:30 C002 one time C003 two times first at 11:25 later at 12:20 Call Customer appears multiple times within each case C001 once C002 twice first at 09:00 second at 09:50 C003 once Thus repeated activities Verify Documents Call Customer

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Verify Documents first is initial verification maybe at start with documents already provided The second is re-verification after missing documents are submitted or after account adjustments In C001 second after Submit Additional ID scan In C003 second after Adjust Account Call Customer first call after verification incomplete second after adjustments

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: rename Verify Documents to Verify Documents Initial and Verify Documents Re-verification Or Verify Documents Initial and Verify Documents Post-Document Submission Or Verify Documents After Submission vs Verify Documents After Adjustment generic Verify Documents Re-verification covers both

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Call Customer rename Call Customer Request Missing Info Call Customer Clarify Discrepancy Call Customer Confirm Adjustment Call Customer Recall Customer based on Additional Context

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Reconstruct revised log with renamed activities for each case C001 Verify Documents Initial Call Customer Request Missing Info Submit Additional Verify Documents Re-verification C002 Verify Documents Initial Call Customer Clarify Discrepancy Adjust Account Call Customer Confirm Adjustment C003 Verify Documents Initial Call Customer Recall Customer Adjust Account Verify Documents Re-verification

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Justification based on position in process first vs second occurrence context in Additional Context column resource etc
